title: Episode 30: Frank Falcinelli, Frank Castronovo & Shane Welch
description: Cathy sits down with Brooklyn’s own Frank and Frank (the Frankies). Frank of Frankies Spuntino and Frank of Prime Meats broke down their recent appearance in the NY Times, and discussed the food world’s relation to cannibus.
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
